0.1.5.name: wordpress/ps-rotator
0.1.5.description:
This plugin allows you to add pictures with rotator shortcode or directly in the source theme. Due to implementation of plug-ins for jQuery jcycle, you can set the transition effect to the next slide. You can also decide whether the plug is to load pictures randomly or not. For now, plug-in supports up to 10 photos. IF YOU LOAD MORE THAN THIS NUMBER WILL BE SKIPPED ALL THE PICTURES!

Requirements:

  • NextGen Gallery Plugin (http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/nextgen-gallery/)
